Question.Subject: How in the world do I join restricted Roleplays on Second Life?
Question.Content:
I'm old enough to join these. I promise to obey their rules....but every time I try to teleport there, it says I'm not allowed.
The two roleplays I'm talking about are Nomos and Malka City.
So...how can I join these if I'm not allowed to teleport there? Lots of other people play....what's the secret? Please, give me suggestions on how to join, begging you....
Question.ChosenAnswer:
We are currently setting up a new game at Nomos, so it is closed to the public. That is why you cannot teleport here at the moment.
You are welcome to check out our website http://www.socionex.com to find out more about it. We hope to be able to open the SIM sometime next week.
If you are in the Nomos group, you will get a notice when the SIM is open ... or try to teleport next week...
Good luck :) Kora

Answer.Content:
We are currently setting up a new game at Nomos, so it is closed to the public. That is why you cannot teleport here at the moment.
You are welcome to check out our website http://www.socionex.com to find out more about it. We hope to be able to open the SIM sometime next week.
If you are in the Nomos group, you will get a notice when the SIM is open ... or try to teleport next week...
Good luck :) Kora
Answer.Reference: Baal and I own Nomos on Second Life. ;)
